name: Starved for Attention
description: A lonely girl named Shelly is eating a burger in a mall. She posts a selfie, and then gains followers on her foodie Instagram. She becomes so happy and excited that she is being followed. There are so many restaurants to eat at and make posts. Every time she eats, she gains followers. The more she eats and gains followers, the happier she becomes. Unfortunately, Shelly needs to get to an appointment.
